TextView.android:text: সুরক্ষা is a safety ensuring appplication for women from all aspects. The main aim of this app is to create a safe feeling for women working or studying outside of their homes. It also aims to prevent domestic violence. No woman will feel insecure when she is alone because she will have a shield like protection in her hand if she has this application on her smartphone. This app will provide er with options like being connected with her parents,siblings,trusted friends and even with the nearby police force in critical situations. So, no woman will be afraid to get out of her house and achieve whatever she wants.
